articles.title: Solemn National Memorial Service on 100th Day since Demise of Kim Jong Il Held
articles.content:
Solemn National Memorial Service on 100th Day since Demise of Kim Jong Il Held
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A solemn national memorial service was held in Pyongyang on Sunday on the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un was present at the memorial service.  
					
					 Attending it were senior officials of the party, state and armed forces organs, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of merits, working people in the city, mourners delegation of overseas Koreans, the vice-chief of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of foreign countries, representatives of international organizations here, members of the military attaches corps and foreign guests.
					
					 All the participants in the memorial service observed a moment's silence in humblest reverence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Chon Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK, made a memorial address.
					
					 He said:
					
					 We have more keenly realized during the mourning period that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and other people of the world and peerlessly legendary great man for the immortal feats he performed on behalf of the country and the nation, the era and mankind. 
					
					 He comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea, Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, glorifying it as a great guiding idea in our era and brightly indicating the road of accomplishing the cause of independence of the popular masses.
					
					 He developed the party, the state and the army into the party, the state and the army of Kim Il Sung under the uplifted banner of transforming the whole society on the Juche idea, achieved the unbreakable single-minded unity of the leader, the party, the army and the people with revolutionary comradeship, benevolent politics and all-embracing politics and dynamically advanced the revolution by dint of the single-minded unity.
					
					 He defended the destiny of the country and the nation and socialism with his original Songun politics and turned the DPRK into a world military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state in the most difficult period of the Korean revolution. This is the outstanding feat he performed for the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 He led the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge for building a thriving nation, bringing about steady victories that heralded happiness and prosperity in the future and unfolding an astonishing reality in which our economy develops into the knowledge-based economy thanks to the drive to break through the cutting edge.
					
					 He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification in which the nation dynamically advances in the idea of "By our nation itself" and made an immortal contribution to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence under the uplifted banner of independence and justice. For this he enjoyed boundless respect and praise as the lodestar of the country's reunification and the world political elder.
					
					 He successfully solved the issue of succession to the leadership to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation. This will shine for all ages as the greatest feat he performed for eternal future.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to glorify this year 2012 as a year of proud victory, a year when an era of prosperity is unfolding, true to the instructions of Kim Jong Il and accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and minister of the People's Armed Forces, spoke on behalf of the KPA, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, on behalf of working people and Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, on behalf of youth and students.
					
					 They said that holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the revolution is the greatest fortune and honor and Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of all the servicepersons and the people with the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of Kim Jong Il amid gun salute.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar memorial services took place in all provinces, cities (districts) and counties on this day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Deeply Mourns for Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Deeply Mourns for Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and people, Sunday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, reflecting the profound condolences of all the service personnel and the people across the country and progressive mankind, and profoundly mourned for General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the 100th day since his demise. 
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Ri Yong Mu, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk and Kim Chang Sop, officials of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK, National Defence Commission, the operations command staff of the Supreme Headquarters of the KPA, commanding officers of large combined units of the KPA, members of the Central Guiding Organ of the WPK in Pyongyang, leading officials of ministries and national institutions, chief secretaries of district and county committees of the WPK here.
					
					 A wreath in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the WPK Central Military Commission, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet was seen before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with senior officials of the party, the state and armed forces organs entered the hall where the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il is hung.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with them observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il and deeply mourned for him.

articles.title: All Party Members, Servicepersons and People Observe Three Minutes' Silence in Memory of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
All Party Members, Servicepersons and People Observe Three Minutes' Silence in Memory of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- 100 days have passed amid strong yearning for General Secretary Kim Jong Il since he passed away so suddenly and so sorrowfully.
					 Flags at half-mast were seen in every nook and corner of the country on Sunday where he left traces of his forced march of highest intensity till the last moments of his life.
					
					 At 12 o'clock sirens and whistles sounded all at once across the country.
					
					 Sounds of whistles were heard from engines on railroads, ships on voyage and vehicles on the roads.
					
					 All the members of the Workers' Party of Korea, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people observed three minutes' silence in the humblest reverence towards the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where Kim Jong Il lies in state and Pyongyang.
					
					 All institutions, industrial establishments, construction sites, rural and fishery farms, schools, streets, villages and families across the country were overcome with grief.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il on Sunday on the 100th day since his demise.
					 The Mansudae Art Studio in Pyongyang was visited by officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, working people and school youth and children in the city.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, institutions at various levels, enterprises, factories, farms, schools and others and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The mourners paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the institutions, organizations and families and bouquets and flowers were placed before the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung Square and the plaza of Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 Overseas Korean mourners' delegations and compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, the representative and staff members of the Office of the World Health Organization here and foreigners laid wreaths and bouquets before the said statues at the studio and the portraits and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in each provincial capital were visited by servicepersons of the KPA, working people of various circles and school youth and children.
					
					 Wreaths and bouquets were laid before the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in Chongjin and Rason cities by staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general, Chinese and Russian guests, overseas compatriots and Chinese residents.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter on Saturday from the General Association of Koreans in China on the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said:
					
					 Born as a son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu and grown up to be a great revolutionary, Kim Jong Il wisely led the revolution and construction for a long period and performed immortal revolutionary feats on behalf of the country and its people, the era and history.
					
					 He conducted energetic external activities for the victory of the socialist cause, the peace and stability of the world and the friendship and solidarity among peoples under the uplifted banner of the independence against imperialism. He visited China several times, bringing the traditional DPRK-China friendship into full bloom, putting the DPRK's international position and authority on the highest level and making an immortal contribution to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He took warm care of the work and life of the Koreans in China at all times like their real father who thinks more of his children far away from him than his children near him. He also highly praised and projected them for what they did though it was their duties to do so for the country and the nation.
					
					 As we are led by you, we are firmly convinced that Kim Jong Il will always be with us overseas compatriots and more deeply grasped the immutable truth that no force on earth can match the might of our people single-mindedly united around you, it said
					
					The letter vowed to overcome sorrow with strength and courage and weather present difficulties and carry on our staunch struggle to achieve a new and great victory of the revolution of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans Are Sure to Carry out Their Cause under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Koreans Are Sure to Carry out Their Cause under Leadership of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- 100 days have passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il passed away.
					 The army and people of the DPRK turned sorrow at the loss of the father of the nation into thousand-fold strength and courage and rose up, closely rallied around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their revolutionary ranks were replete with iron faith and pledge to carry out Kim Jong Il's last instructions. They demonstrated the might of the harmonious whole of the leader and the people in terms of thinking, intention and moral obligation.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK is the most solid as it is based on people's absolute trust and loyalty for the great leaders.
					
					 The absolute trust and loyalty of the army and people for Kim Jong Un has long historical origin.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is identical to President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership and traits.
					
					 Upholding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the van of the revolution, the army and people of the DPRK enshrined the noble truth that their destiny can be guaranteed forever only when a steady continuity is given to the traditions of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 This has become the most pure and unbreakable faith amid all the tempests and trials of history.
					
					 For the past 100 days not only the nation but also the nature grieved over the loss of the father of the nation. In this period, the people more firmly grasped the extraordinary wisdom and leadership feats of the legendary great man whose great personality should go down for all ages.
					
					 Looking up to another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu who pursues the benevolent politics with outstanding ideological and theoretical wisdom and political ability, the army and people keenly realized once again that they are blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The traditions of Mt. Paektu that are given a steady continuity generation after generation and the solid single-minded unity in which the leader and the people have become a community liked with the same destiny provide a key to the invincibility of the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 There is nothing to fear of or hesitate no matter what storm and stress may come in the way ahead of the Korean revolution as the army and people dynamically advance under the leadership of Kim Jong Un amid the steady continuity being given to the revolutionary cause of Songun. 
					
					 They will hold fast to the traditions of the single-minded unity, an all-powerful treasured sword of Juche Korea, Songun Korea, and will surely achieve the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation by dint of that unity.

articles.title: Loyalty Displayed in Erecting Statues
articles.content:
Loyalty Displayed in Erecting Statues
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, erected at the Mansudae Art Studio in the capital city of Pyongyang, were unveiled on February 14 to mark the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (February 16).
					 After the sad news on the demise of Kim Jong Il was announced on Dec. 19, Juche 100 (2011), requests for erecting his statue came to the studio from across the country.
					
					 Many people volunteered to work for erecting the statues. Among them were Paek Hyon Bi and Kim Mi Ra, 70-year-old women, and Min Yong Su, a worker at the Central Zoo.
					
					 People in North and South Hamgyong provinces, Jagang and Ryanggang provinces, Kaesong City and other parts of the country sincerely assisted this project.
					
					 More than 165,000 people have visited the statues up till now, pledging to remain faithful to the dear respected Kim Jong Un and thus implement Kim Jong Il's behests to the letter.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Revered by World People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Revered by World People
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Ardent yearning for General Secretary Kim Jong Il has run high among foreigners, too, during the 100-day mourning period.
					 This was represented in gifts and honorary titles organizations and individuals of different countries presented to him in those days, praying for his immortality.
					
					 The gifts were sent by the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia, Brazilian Centre for Peace and Solidarity with Peoples and Al Bayan National Trading Company of Kuwait and personages of Kuwait and Vietnam.
					
					 The Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics presented to him the Nepalese International Peace Prize and the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia the title of its honorary chairman.
					
					 Gusau City, Zamfara State, and Damaturu City, Yobe Province, of Nigeria and Caluma City, Bolivar Province, of Ecuador presented to him their honorary citizenships.
					
					 It is indicative of the world progressives' profound reverence for Kim Jong Il, who had reliably defended the global peace by dint of the Songun (military-first) politics.

articles.title: Wreath Sent to Portrait of Smiling Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Wreath Sent to Portrait of Smiling Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification sent a wreath to the portrait of smiling General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the 100th day since his demise.
					 Vice-Chairman of the Headquarters Ro Su Hui Sunday laid the wreath before the portrait at Kim Il Sung Square.

articles.title: Many Songs, Poems Created in Memory of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Many Songs, Poems Created in Memory of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's will to hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever is lively represented in a number of songs and poems created during the 100-day mourning period.
					 The song "Strength of Korea", carried in the daily Rodong Sinmun on January 1, is a hymn summarizing the feats Kim Jong Il performed in leading the Songun (military-first) revolution for scores of years.
					
					 It deals with the truth that Kim Jong Il was just the strength of Korea, which the people had experienced for the past 20 years when breathtaking events were taking place in the DPRK.
					
					 The song "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" reflects the people's wish for the immortality of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The song "Yearning Is Boundless" well represents the will of servicepersons and civilians to always hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem and remain loyal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to his behests.
					
					 "General Kim Jong Il's People, Rise up", "Guidance Tour of Frontline Units Will Last Forever", "Korea in December", "We Will Not Sit Still with Tears" and "People Find Courage in His Image" -- all these poems and lyrics reflect the ardent yearning for the leader and the steadfast will of the army and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK People Pray for Eternity of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
DPRK People Pray for Eternity of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- 100 days has passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il passed away. 
					 The 100-day mourning period witnessed the steadfast will of all the servicepersons and civilians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to eternally hold him in high esteem. 
					
					 The title of DPRK Hero was awarded to the leader, in praise of the undying feats he performed on behalf of the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence for half a century.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea on Jan. 12 announced its decision to keep the leader in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, erect his statue, institute February 16, his birthday, as the Day of the Shining Star and display large portraits with broad smile on his face and build towers to his immortality across the country.
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly issued a decree on instituting Order of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Il Prize, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize. Also gold and silver coins, with letters "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Be Immortal" inscribed in them, were minted to commemorate his 70th birth anniversary.
					
					 Badges carrying an image of smiling Kim Jong Il have been distributed to people throughout the country.
					
					 Equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on horsebacks were erected, the first of its kind in the history.
					
					 Letters "Peerless Patriot General Kim Jong Il. February 16, Juche 101 (2012)" were carved on a mammoth rock in Mt. Sokda in Jungsan County, South Phyongan Province.
					
					 The Kumsusan Memorial Palace was renamed the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the greatest national holiday. This was an expression of the Korean army and people's fixed will to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Juche and surely accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 On February 14, the title of Generalissimo of the DPRK was conferred on Kim Jong Il, who had turned the DPRK into a military power and led the standoff with the U.S.-led imperialists to a victory.
					
					 Meanwhile, Vol. 1 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" was published in the DPRK. And the 16th Kimjongilia Festival was held ceremoniously to mark his birth anniversary.

articles.title: People Miss Kim Jong Il Always in Jacket
articles.content:
People Miss Kim Jong Il Always in Jacket
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- On the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, servicepersons and civilians of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are paying tribute to him before his large portraits displayed in all parts of the country.
					 Looking up to portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il, they are greatly touched by the image of the leader clad in jacket.
					
					 The jacket was as good as a uniform for the leader, who devoted his all to the country's development and people's wellbeing, true to the lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Clad in this jacket, he inspected military units, factories and farms even in snowy or sunny days.
					
					 He was also wearing this simple jacket when he passed away in a train on his way for field guidance.
					
					 The image of smiling Kim Jong Il, dressed in jacket all his life, will be unforgettable forever for the Korean people.

articles.title: Seminar of Foreign Crewmen Held
articles.content:
eminar of Foreign Crewmen Held
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A seminar of foreign crewmen on undying feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place at Chongjin Port, North Hamgyong Province Sunday.
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of the Panamanian- flagged ship.
					
					 The speakers said that the past 100 days since his demise were the period which showed harmonious whole between the leader and people.
					
					 His revolutionary career was a brilliant one of peerless patriot and great man who devoted his all to the country and people and made an immortal contribution to global independence, they said.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 Prior to the seminar, they laid a wreath before the portrait of a smiling Kim Jong Il set up in Chongjin City and paid silent tribute to him.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (10)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (10)
Kim Il Sung's Feat in Democratic Reforms
					
					 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a country where the popular masses enjoy a genuine life as masters of society.
					
					 After the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, the President paid big efforts to enforcing democratic reforms, in order to provide the Korean people with socio-economic and cultural conditions for enjoying a new genuine life. 
					
					 With a view to carrying out the agrarian reform, before anything else, he put forward the slogan "Land to the tillers!" Peasants made up the overwhelming majority of the population in Korea at that time.
					
					 He personally went to local rural areas, including Taedong County, South Phyongan Province, to acquaint himself with the peasants' aspiration and confirmed by himself the objects of land confiscation, methods of land confiscation and distribution and ways of abolishing the tenant system for good. 
					
					 On March 5, Juche 35 (1946) the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea promulgated the "Law on Agrarian Reform in North Korea" at its Third Session.
					
					 The promulgation marked a milestone in making Korea's peasants as owners of land, completely eliminating the landed class and putting an end to the feudal landownership in the country.
					
					 After the agrarian reform, the President began the nationalization of major industries.
					
					 With the slogan "Factories to workers", he encouraged workers to play a pivotal role in its realization.
					
					 He promulgated the "Law on Nationalization of Industries, Transport, Communications, Banks and So On" on August 10, 1946.
					
					 The law stipulated that the state shall confiscate, free of charge, all the industrial establishments, mines, power stations, railway transport, communications, banks, commercial and cultural institutions and others, which were owned by the Japan government, corporations and individuals and Korean traitors, and nationalize them.
					
					 Meanwhile Kim Il Sung promulgated laws on labor and sexual equality, followed by democratic policies for education, culture, justice and prosecution, to provide the people with democratic freedom and rights in all fields.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the democratic reforms were smoothly carried out, colonial and feudal remnants completely abolished, the national industry restored and national educational and cultural system suited to the people's democratic system built in a short span of time.
					
					 Inspired by the President's idea and devoted efforts for the national prosperity, the Korean people turned out in the patriotic drive to develop the national economy and lay foundations for the country's prosperity, through various movements for building a new country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Bangladeshi President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Bangladeshi President
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Zillur Rahman, president of Bangladesh, on the 41st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of Bangladesh greater success in the work for independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Bangladeshi PM
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Saturday sent a message of greeting to Sheikh Hasina, prime minister of Bangladesh, on the 41st anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields, wishing the prime minister greater success in her work for prosperity and economic development of the country.
					
					 On the same day Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun also sent a similar message to his Bangladeshi counterpart Dipu Moni.

articles.title: City (District) and County Party Conferences for WPK Conference Held
articles.content:
City (District) and County Party Conferences for WPK Conference Held
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- City (district) and county party conferences were held in the run up to the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were delegates elected by party organizations of various levels including institutions, industrial establishments and co-op farms in cities (districts) and counties.
					
					 The delegates paid silent tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The city (district) and country party conferences discussed the matter of electing delegates to provincial (municipal) party conferences. Nominated there were candidates for delegates to the provincial (municipal) party conferences.
					
					 They nominated the officials and other party members who performed distinguished feats in strengthening the WPK and building a thriving socialist nation as candidates for delegates to the provincial (municipal) party conferences. There were elections of candidates for delegates at the conferences.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed full support and approval of dispatching the candidates as delegates to the provincial (municipal) party conferences, believing that the nominated candidates will make positive contributions to strengthening the WPK into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and successfully carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The conferences elected the nominated candidates for delegates as delegates to the provincial (municipal) party conferences.

articles.title: Papers Call for Winning Fresh Victory in Juche Revolution
articles.content:
Papers Call for Winning Fresh Victory in Juche Revolution
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Papers Sunday dedicate editorials to the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the past 100 days were a period when all people have successfully carried out the cause of immortalizing the leader. They are characterized by a great change in which a gigantic advance has been pushed ahead to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il in all fields of the revolution and construction, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 During this period, the unbreakable single-minded unity of the DPRK, the greatest heritage of Kim Jong Il, has reached a more sublime level and the history of struggle in those days serves a precious wherewithal for its army and people to glorify their worthwhile life and weather all hardships of the revolution.
					
					 They are steadfastly advancing along the road of Juche revolution, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, though they suffered a great loss to the nation.
					
					 Standing firm is the center of leadership of the Korean revolution, center of unity and the society has achieved the best political stability.
					
					 No force on earth can deter all the service personnel and people of the DPRK from making a grand advance, single-mindedly united around the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, shoulder to shoulder with him, singing the song "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives."
					
					 His leadership means the lifeline of the cause of Juche revolution and his care means that of a great father to whom the army and people can entrust their destiny and future.
					
					 It is necessary to glorify the DPRK which attained a full-fledged position of a power in the era of Kim Jong Il as a more thriving socialist nation of Juche in the era of Kim Jong Un. This is a sacred mission assigned to the present generation.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for thoroughly and unconditionally implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il without any slightest deflection or concession, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus bring earlier the day of final victory in the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, the cause of Juche revolution.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Newspapers Laud Kim Il Sung's Exploits
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Newspapers Laud Kim Il Sung's Exploits
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Bangladesh carried special write-ups on the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The March 14th issue of Blits allotted its six pages to articles under various titles illustrated with photos of revolutionary activities of peerlessly great men.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, Eternal President" praised him as father of socialist Korea as it is demonstrating its might as a politic-ideological, military and scientific and technological power in the international community.
					
					 For the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung performed by contributing not only to the Korean revolution but to the human cause of independence he enjoyed distinguished prestige in the world political circles and received boundless reverence from progressive mankind, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Lots of works he authored by conducting energetic ideological and theoretical activities serve as a precious ideological and theoretical pabulum and an inspiring banner for many politicians, personages of social circles and progressives of the world.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Declaration of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader", referred to the fact that he visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on the New Year, adding this was a historic declaration showing his firm faith to add shine to the Songun leadership exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and carry forward the Songun politics without even a slight deviation.
					
					 Ekota in an article titled "Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung" on March 18 said that his undying feats and noble virtues touched many people in the world and made everybody ardently revere and follow him.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Political Parties, Organizations in Nordic Region
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Political Parties, Organizations in Nordic Region
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of political parties and organizations of the Nordic Region was held in Sweden on March 17. It discussed the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of Korea's peaceful reunification, the socialist cause and the human cause of independence.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of the peerlessly great men, photos on their noble revolutionary careers and undying feats and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the seminar were delegations and delegates of political parties and organizations in the Nordic Region including the Communist Party in Sweden, the Communist Party of Sweden, the Communist Party in Denmark, the Communist Party of Norway, the Sweden－Korea Friendship Association, the Friendship Society Norway－Korea and members of the Communist Party in Sweden and a delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden in the opening address said that Kim Il Sung was the benefactor of the liberation of the Korean people, the founder of the DPRK, the pioneer of the socialist cause and the great man.
					
					 The international secretary of the party in the keynote report praised Kim Il Sung as the great statesman who performed the undying feats in the sacred cause for the liberation of the country and its prosperity and the true internationalist who helped materially and morally the progressive people in their struggle for independence, sovereignty and the building of a new society.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the distinguished leader who clearly indicated the road to be followed by the world socialist movement under the banner of independence and the peerlessly great man born of Heaven who performed great feats on behalf of the era and revolution with his clairvoyant wisdom, strong will and extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership, the international secretary noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Norway, the chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden and other speakers explained and proved that Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il wisely led the Korean people's struggle for socialist construction and national reunification and made undying contributions to strengthening the world socialist movement.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: WPK's Just Cause Supported by Swedish Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK's Just Cause Supported by Swedish Party Leader
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden, on March 17 met with Ri Hui Chol, DPRK ambassador to Sweden.
					 The demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il is an irrevocable loss to not only the Korean people but to progressive mankind, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the outstanding thinker and theoretician and distinguished leader who made great contributions to the advance of the socialist cause and global independence by building the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power and the country centered on the popular masses with his extraordinary ideas and theories and energetic leadership.
					
					 The joint seminar held by political parties and organizations of the Nordic Region on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung offered an important occasion in supporting and encouraging the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Communist Party in Sweden will in the future, too, extend solidarity to the WPK in its just cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Has Legitimate Right to Conquer Space: Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Has Legitimate Right to Conquer Space: Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations and figures of different countries released statements on March 20 in support of the DPRK's plan for launching Kwangmyongsong-3, an earth observation satellite.
					 The Bangladesh－Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee in a statement fully supported the statement of a spokesman for the Korean Committee for Space Technology that the DPRK's projected launch of a scientific and technological satellite for peaceful purposes would contribute to promoting international confidence and cooperation in the field of space science researches and satellite launch.
					
					 The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany in a statement noted that to use space for peaceful purposes is a legitimate right of a sovereign state, extending solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to conquer space.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, in a statement said that Kwangmyongsong-3 is a satellite aiming to use space for peaceful purposes, adding socialist Korea has a legitimate right to conquer space.
					
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, in a statement stressed that no force can bar the DPRK's development of space and its use for peaceful purposes and has any right to find fault with it.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Joint Seminar of Political Parties, Organizations of Nordic Region
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Joint Seminar of Political Parties, Organizations of Nordic Region
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter on March 17 from the participants in the joint seminar of political parties and organizations of the Nordic Region on the feats of President Kim Il Sung. They included Anders Karlsson, chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden, the chairman of the Communist Party of Sweden, Svend Haakon Jacobsen, chairman of the Communist Party of Norway, Henning Jakobssen,delegate of the Communist Party in Denmark, Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Dag Norum, vice-chairman of the Friendship Society Norway-Korea, Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, and the chairman of the Revolutionary Communist Youth                        of Sweden.
					 The letter expressed firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle for national independence, the reunification of the country and socialism and extended full support to the Workers' Party of Korea wisely leading their struggle to victory.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of independence and socialism, shattering the imperialists' persistent moves for aggression and provocations, the letter stressed, and went on:
					
					 The steadfast stand maintained by the DPRK is a source of inspiration not only to us struggling to defend world peace and security and the right to choose our own way but to all other people.
					
					 All the imperialists' war preparations and moves for aggression should be discontinued and the U.S. forces' presence in the Korean Peninsula brought to an end, the letter noted.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK in April Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK in April Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Brazil and Guinea to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 80th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition, lecture and film show took place in Brazil and a lecture in Guinea between March 14 and 16.
					
					 On display in the venue of the exhibition were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits, books and pictures introducing the DPRK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 The chairman of the Santa Catarina State Legislative Council of Brazil said that the exhibition would offer visitors an opportunity to know well about the Korean people who have registered signal achievements in all fields, weathering stern trials under the steersmanship of their great leaders.
					
					 The chairperson of the Santa Catarina State Committee of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man who freed the Korean people from exploitation and oppression and built a socialist power centered on the popular masses independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence in the DPRK.
					
					 The chairperson of the Santa Catarina State Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party noted that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il would always be remembered by progressive mankind as the sun for their undying feats performed in the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 The chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art introduced the legends about the loving care shown by Kim Il Sung for the people, adding that he was totally dedicated to the people's happiness.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por 100o dia de deceso de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por 100o dia de deceso de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en esta capital el acto central en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il con motivo del 100o dia desde su fallecimiento.
					Asistio a la ocasion el Maximo Dirigente         Kim Jong Un.
					
					Participaron los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los benemeritos, los trabajadores capitalinos, las delegaciones de recordacion de compatriotas residentes en ultramar, el vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales, los miembros del Cuerpo de 
					
					 Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo los mas sentidos tributos a la memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio el discurso de la ocasion. 
					
					Choe dijo que durante el periodo de recordacion, el mundo pudo conocer bien que Kim Jong Il es gran dirigente y gran hombre legendario que vive siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano y de todo el mundo por sus imborrables proezas realizadas ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la humanidad. 
					
					El Dirigente profundizo y desarrollo globalmente la idea Juche, la del Songun, concebida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, para que ese pensamiento sirviera de idea directriz de la epoca actual, e ilumino claramente la ruta de avance de las masas populares por el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia, acoto y continuo:
					
					Con la meta de transformar todo el partido y toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche, el Dirigente desarrollo el partido, el Estado y el ejercito en los de Kim Il Sung e impulso la revolucion con el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre el lider, el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo, lograda con la camaraderia revolucionaria y la politica abarcadora y de beneficios populares. 
					
					En el periodo mas severo de la revolucion coreana, defendio el destino del pais y la nacion y el socialismo practicando la original politica de Songun y concedio a la patria la posicion de digna potencia militar de talla mundial y poseedor de armas nucleares. 
					
					Esto es la proeza extraordinaria del Dirigente para todas las generaciones venideras de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Al conducir al frente la marcha general revolucionaria por la construccion del Estado prospero, el propicio sucesivamente los acontecimientos que pronostican el futuro prospero y feliz y trajo la realidad asombrosa en que la economia coreana pasa a la era de economia basada en la intelectualidad en el fragor de la campana por alcanzar las tecnologias supersofisticadas. 
					
					Abrio la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que avanza a pasos firmes bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" e hizo inmortal aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad enarbolando la bandera de independencia y justicia, gracias a lo cual es respetado como lucero de la reunificacion de la patria y veterano politico de prestigio mundial. 
					
					Resolvio satisfactoriamente el problema de sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, lo cual es su proeza mas relevante y eterna para el futuro maravilloso de la nacion de Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Por ultimo, el orador llamo a glorificar el 2012 como el de brillantes triunfos en que se abra la era de prosperidad y llevar a feliz termino la causa de construccion del Estado prospero socialista y la revolucionaria del Juche, siguiendo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y cumpliendo el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Le siguieron en usar la palabra Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares en representacion de los oficiales y soldados del EPC,  Hyon Sang Ju, presidente del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea en representacion de la clase obrera, y Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en representacion de los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el puesto supremo de la revolucion es la maxima fortuna y gloria y apuntaron que gracias a el, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il estara siempre vivo en el alma de todos los militares y civiles junto con el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Mientras se tiraban salvas en honor del Dirigente, todos los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio. 
					
					El mismo dia, se realizaron actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades (o municipios) y distritos del pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde tributo a Kim Jong Il en Palacio Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde tributo a Kim Jong Il en Palacio Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, visito el dia 25 el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan y expreso ahi profundas condolencias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il con motivo del 100o dia desde su fallecimiento en representacion de los militares y habitantes de todo el pais y la humanidad progresista del mundo. 
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Jon Pyong Ho, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Ri Yong Mu, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, los funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional, los miembros de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC, los miembros del organo de direccion central del partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios directivos de ministerios y organos centrales y los secretarios responsables de los comites del partido en los municipios y distritos de la capital.
					
					Ante el retrato del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa estaba colocada una ofrenda floral a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, el CDN, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					Junto con los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas,       Kim Jong Un entro en el hall donde se encuentra el retrato mencionado. 
					
					El expreso con los acompanantes las profundas condolencias guardando un momento de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Jong Il por 100o dia de su deceso
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Jong Il por 100o dia de su deceso
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 100o dia del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fueron colocadas el dia 25 las ofrendas florales ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y los retratos de este con amplia sonrisa. 
					Concurrieron a la capitalina Casa de Creacion Mansudae los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares capitalinos. 
					
					Fueron depositados las ofrendas, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, las instituciones a todos niveles, empresas, fabricas, granjas, escuelas, etc. en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Al pie de los retratos del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa en la Plaza Kim Il Sung, la explanada del Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de la capital se depositaron tambien las ofrendas, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos, entidades, familias, etc.
					
					Hicieron otro tanto las delegaciones de recordacion de compatriotas en ultramar, los coreanos residentes en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, el representante y otros miembros de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares acudieron a los retratos de Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa instalados en las capitales provinciales. 
					
					Los miembros de los consulados generales de China y Rusia en Chongjin, los huespedes chinos y rusos, los compatriotas en ultramar y los chinos residentes en Corea rindieron tributo al Dirigente ante sus retratos mismos instalados en las ciudades de Chongjin y Rason.

articles.title: Guardan 3 minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Guardan 3 minutos de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Transcurrieron 100 dias desde el fallecimiento inesperado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Fueron izadas el dia 25 a media asta las banderas en todos los confines de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea donde el ha dejado sus pisadas de direccion en el terreno realizada a modo de marcha forzada hasta el ultimo momento de su vida. 
					
					Al mediodia, repercutieron simultaneamente en todo el pais las sirenas provenientes de las locomotoras, embarcaciones, vehiculos, etc.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes guardaron 3 minutos de silencio poniendose hacia el Palacio del Sol de Kumsusan donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il y hacia Pyongyang.
					
					Estaban sumergidos en el clima de pesar los organos, fabricas, empresas, lugares de construccion, poblados de campesinos y pescadores, escuelas, avenidas, aldeas y familias de todo el pais.

articles.title: Elegidos delegados a las conferencias provinciales del Partido
articles.content:
Elegidos delegados a las conferencias provinciales del Partido
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las conferencias del partido de las ciudades (o municipios) y distritos en visperas de la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea prevista para abril venidero.
					En las ocasiones participaron los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones del partido de distintos niveles, incluyendo las de organos, empresas, fabricas y granjas cooperativas de las respectivas ciudades (o municipios) y distritos.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Primero tuvo lugar la proposicion de los candidatos a delegado a las conferencias de provincias (o las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro).
					
					Seguidamente, se realizaron las elecciones sobre los funcionarios y militantes del partido propuestos como candidatos por sus excepcionales meritos acumulados para el desarrollo del PTC y la construccion del Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Los oradores en las ocasiones dieron su apoyo y aprobacion a los candidatos expresando la conviccion de que estos contribuiran activamente a fortalecer el PTC como organizacion de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y a cumplir con brillantez la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion del Estado prospero socialista apoyando con fidelidad la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los candidatos fueron elegidos como delegados a las conferencias de provincias (o las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro).
